scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.client-dev: node ./scripts/checkdeps.js ./ ./client && lookenv --path=lookenv.config.js --dotenv=.env && cd client && npm start
scripts.server-dev: node ./scripts/checkdeps.js ./ ./server && cd server && npm run start-dev
scripts.build-client: lookenv --path=lookenv.config.js --dotenv=.env && cd client && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test-client && npm run test-server
scripts.setup: npm i && npm run client-install && npm run server-install && node ./lookenv.config.js
